transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, good morning, sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Alok baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Kaise tabiyat aapke brother se baat hui thi ki unhone bataya ki keh rahe hain sir hospital mein gaye hain kuch tabiyat vagaira hai aap unki. 
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Ji hospital mein bister mein hua tha hospital mein admit hua.
Executive: Achcha kya hua kya dikkat ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Wo spine ka disc slip disc hua hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: 
Executive: Koi heavy weight vagaira uthaya tha kya kaise achanak?
Customer: Wo rehta hai hamara electric motors vagaira uthate hain wo.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Usko jaise hua tha. Parso hua tha to laptop bhi nahi tha mere paas aisa hua.
Executive: Ha main isiliye to na main us time fir aapne to phone uthaya nahi to fir second number pe phone uthaya tha. 
Customer: Takleef bahut ho raha tha isiliye phone kiske uthayenge hospital ja rahe the na tab.
Executive: Nahi nahi main samajh gaya sir main. 
Customer: Aisa hua.
Executive: Abhi abhi mobile tha uthaya nahi hoga shayad usme. 
Executive: Ha ha isliye wo bhaiya ne bataya mujhe to pata bhi nahi tha actually us time subah aap bata to rahe the ki bhai kuch hospital wagere mere ko laga ki bhai ho sakta hai kabhi kisi ko dekhne gaye ho ya kuch is tarike se wo. 
Customer: Mujhe ye nahi pata tha ki. 
Executive: To abhi possibility hai sir aaj ispe ek bar hum log video meeting pe connect kar sake ya kab main aapko fir further connect karunga. 
Customer: Mangaya hu laptop mangaya hu main hospital mein leke aate phone karta hu aapko. 
Executive: Theek hai aap ek bar mujhe message dal dena theek hai to us hisab se hum log isko address karke jo hai jo bhi hai connect kar lenge asal mein kya hai ki wo ticket open hota hai to wo mujhe usi din ka close karna tha par teen din ho gaye char din ho gaye to usko main close kar deta hu till the time aapke paas mera whatsapp ka number hai ya aap jaise hi available honge to aap mujhe ek bar message dal dena main video meeting pe aapko connect karunga. 
Customer: Whatsapp aapke whatsapp number se mujhe message dal dena thoda sa. 
Executive: Abhi abhi main dal deta hu sir abhi turant ke turant maine us din bhi kiya tha aapko whatsapp jo hai ek bar main dobara ek minute. 
Executive: Abhi main whatsapp pe hi ka message dal raha hu sir main ye mera whatsapp ka number hai this side dal raha hu. 
Customer: Ek minute check karwa lo. 
Executive: Ye sir ye hai na?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is hospitalized due to a slip disc.

- Unable to attend a video meeting immediately.

- Needs executive's WhatsApp number to message when available.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about customer's health.

- Agreed to schedule a video meeting later.

- Shared WhatsApp number for future communication.

- Executive will keep the ticket open until customer is available.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will message when available for a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- health, video meeting, whatsapp, ticket
